PetBlocks Documentation¶

Introduction¶

Welcome to PetBlocksDocs, the official documentation for the open-source PetBlocks project.

PetBlocks is a spigot and also a sponge plugin to use blocks and custom heads as pets in Minecraft.

You can find it on Spigotmc.org and Spongepowered.org.
